metadata.title: CVE-2024-53092 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:virtio_pci: Fix admin vq cleanup by using correct info pointervp_modern_avq_cleanup() and vp_del_vqs() clean up admin vqresources by virtio_pci_vq_info pointer. The info pointer of adminvq is stored in vp_dev->admin_vq.info instead of vp_dev->vqs[].Using the info pointer from vp_dev->vqs[] for admin vq causes akernel NULL pointer dereference bug.In vp_modern_avq_cleanup() and vp_del_vqs(), get the info pointerfrom vp_dev->admin_vq.info for admin vq to clean up the resources.Also make info ptr as argument of vp_del_vq() to be symmetric withvp_setup_vq().vp_reset calls vp_modern_avq_cleanup, and causes the Call Trace:==================================================================BUG: kernel NULL pointer dereference, address:0000000000000000...CPU: 49 UID: 0 PID: 4439 Comm: modprobe Not tainted 6.11.0-rc5 #1RIP: 0010:vp_reset+0x57/0x90 [virtio_pci]Call Trace: <TASK>... ? vp_reset+0x57/0x90 [virtio_pci] ? vp_reset+0x38/0x90 [virtio_pci] virtio_reset_device+0x1d/0x30 remove_vq_common+0x1c/0x1a0 [virtio_net] virtnet_remove+0xa1/0xc0 [virtio_net] virtio_dev_remove+0x46/0xa0... virtio_pci_driver_exit+0x14/0x810 [virtio_pci]==================================================================

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53092` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
